feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
